name: bad-dreams
caption: Bad Dreams

effect.short: Damages [sleeping]{mechanic:sleep} opponents for 1/8 their max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn.
effect.full: Opposing Pokémon take 1/8 of their maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp} in damage after each turn while they are [asleep]{mechanic:asleep}.

flavorText: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokémon.
